summary: An adman and an ad woman put a dangerous milk tycoon in line for the White House.

O'Brien|Jack Orrison|Yvonne Peattie|Tony Regan|Cosmo Sardo|Jeffrey Sayre|Grady Sutton
director: Director: H. Bruce Humberstone (as Bruce Humberstone)
title: Madison Avenue
